content: argh matey this scurvy pirate is set to sail around the carribean with all his scurvy friends this pirate stands about 9 tall and was made with scraps of red heart super saver yarn and a size g crochet hook and a few beads you probably won t even have to go to the yarn store ****i wouldnt recommend this doll for a child as it contains small parts that can be chewed or bitten off ***
